AT.name: Petz Fantasy 3D
AT.description: Lass aus magischen Eiern niedliche Fantasiewesen schlüpfen. -Füttere sie und beobachte in 3D, wie die Magie in ihnen stärker wird! - Kümmere dich um deine Tiere und erlebe in 3D, wie sie auf dich reagieren! -Springe von einer magischen Welt in die nächste und bringe ihnen in lustigen Minispielen magische Fähigkeiten bei.

AU.name: Petz Fantasy 3D
AU.description: Hatch magic eggs into adorable fantasy creatures. Nurture them and watch their magical powers grow in 3D! -Care for your Pets and watch how they react to you in 3D! -Jump from one magical world to another and play fun mini-games to teach them magical powers.

BG.name: Petz Fantasy 3D
BG.description: Hatch magic eggs into adorable fantasy creatures. Nurture them and watch their magical powers grow in 3D! -Care for your Pets and watch how they react to you in 3D! -Jump from one magical world to another and play fun mini-games to teach them magical powers.

BE.name: Petz Fantasy 3D
BE.description: Elève d'adorables créatures magiques. Occupe-toi d'elles et observe leurs pouvoirs se développer, le tout en 3D ! -Interagis avec eux comme avec de vrais animaux de compagnie ! -Apprends à tes Petz à utiliser leurs pouvoirs magiques grâce aux mini-jeux.

ES.name: Petz Fantasy 3D
ES.description: Haz que adorables criaturas fantásticas salgan de los huevos mágicos. ¡Aliméntalas y observa cómo sus poderes mágicos toman forma en 3D! -¡Cuida de tus mascotas y mira cómo interactúan contigo en 3D! -Salta de un mundo mágico a otro y juega a divertidos minijuegos para enseñarles poderes mágicos.

IT.name: Petz Fantasy 3D
IT.description: Fai schiudere le uova magiche che contengono adorabili creature fantastiche. Prenditi cura di loro e osserva i loro poteri svilupparsi in un ambiente 3D! - Accudisci gli animaletti e osserva le loro reazioni in un ambiente 3D! - Passa da un mondo magico all'altro per provare divertenti minigiochi, utili per insegnare agli animaletti come usare i loro poteri magici.

LT.name: Petz Fantasy 3D

NL.name: Petz Fantasy 3D
NL.description: Broed magische eieren uit tot schattige fantasiedieren. Verzorg ze en zie hun magische krachten groeien in 3D! -Zorg voor je Petz en kijk hoe ze op je reageren in 3D! -Spring van de ene magische wereld in de andere en speel leuke minispellen om je Petz magische krachten aan te leren!

NZ.name: Petz Fantasy 3D
NZ.description: Hatch magic eggs into adorable fantasy creatures. Nurture them and watch their magical powers grow in 3D! -Care for your Pets and watch how they react to you in 3D! -Jump from one magical world to another and play fun mini-games to teach them magical powers.

PT.name: Petz Fantasy 3D
PT.description: Choca ovos mágicos com adoráveis criaturas de fantasia. Alimenta-as e vê os seus poderes mágicos crescerem em 3D! - Cuida dos teus animais de estimação e observa como reagem perante ti em 3D! - Salta de um mundo mágico para o outro e joga mini jogos divertidos para lhes ensinares poderes mágicos.

RU.name: Petz Fantasy 3D
RU.description: Чудесным созданиям, вылупляющимся из волшебных яиц, нужна забота! Смотрите, как они обретают магические способности, - теперь в 3D! - Ухаживайте за своими питомцами в 3D! - Играйте в увлекательные мини-игры в разных мирах, чтобы обучить своих любимцев магии!
